hint.en_US: Creates a scaled image with new dimensions (width, height) .If either width or height is set to 0, it will be set to an aspect ratio preserving value.
hint.zh_CN: 创建具有新尺寸（宽度，高度）的缩放图像。如果width或height设置为0，则将其设置为长宽比保留值。

hint.en_US: Downscales an image preserving its aspect ratio to the maximum dimensions (maxWidth, maxHeight).
hint.zh_CN: 将保留宽高比的图像缩小到最大尺寸（maxWidth，maxHeight）。
